verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Sanctify <WH6942> unto me all the first-born <WH1060>, whatsoever openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7358> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, both of man <WH120> and of beast <WH929>: it is mine.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Remember <WH2142> this <WH2088> day <WH3117>, in which ye came out <WH3318> from Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>; for by strength <WH2392> of hand <WH3027> Jehovah <WH3068> brought you out <WH3318> from this place <WH2557>: there shall no leavened bread be eaten <WH398>.
This day <WH3117> ye go forth <WH3318> in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>.

And it shall be <WH3068>, when Jehovah shall bring <WH935> thee into the land <WH776> of the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Amorite <WH567>, and the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>, which he sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> thee <WH776>, a land flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, that thou shalt keep <WH5647> this service <WH5656> in this month <WH2320>.
Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>, and in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall be a feast <WH2282> to Jehovah <WH3068>.

Unleavened bread <WH4682> shall be eaten <WH398> throughout the seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; and there shall no leavened bread <WH2557> be seen <WH7200> with thee <WH7603>, neither shall there be leaven seen <WH7200> with thee <WH1366>, in all thy borders.

And thou shalt tell <WH5046> thy son <WH1121> in that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>, It is because of <WH5668> that <WH2088> which Jehovah <WH3068> did <WH6213> for me when I came forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> unto thee upon thy hand <WH3027>, and for a memorial <WH2146> between thine eyes <WH5869>, that the law <WH8451> of Jehovah <WH3068> may be in thy mouth <WH6310>: for with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> hath Jehovah <WH3068> brought thee out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>.
Thou shalt therefore keep <WH8104> this ordinance <WH2708> in its season <WH4150> from year <WH3117> to year <WH3117>.

And it shall be <WH3068>, when Jehovah shall bring <WH935> thee into the land <WH776> of the Canaanite <WH3669>, as he sware <WH7650> unto thee and to thy fathers <WH1>, and shall give it thee <WH5414>,

that thou shalt set apart <WH5674> unto Jehovah <WH3068> all that openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7358>, and every firstling <WH6363> which thou hast that cometh <WH7698> of a beast <WH929>; the males <WH2145> shall be Jehovah <WH3068>'s.

And every firstling <WH6363> of an ass <WH2543> thou shalt redeem <WH6299> with a lamb <WH7716>; and if thou wilt not redeem <WH6299> it <WH6202>, then thou shalt break its neck: and all the first-born <WH1060> of man <WH120> among thy sons <WH1121> shalt thou redeem <WH6299>.

And it shall be <WH1121>, when thy son asketh <WH7592> thee in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559>, What is this <WH559>? that thou shalt say unto him <WH2392>, By strength of hand <WH3027> Jehovah <WH3068> brought us out <WH3318> from Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>:

and it came to pass <WH6547>, when Pharaoh would hardly <WH7185> let us go <WH7971>, that Jehovah <WH3068> slew <WH2026> all the first-born <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both the first-born <WH1060> of man <WH120>, and the first-born <WH1060> of beast <WH929>: therefore I sacrifice <WH2076> to Jehovah <WH3068> all that openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7358>, being males <WH2145>; but all the first-born <WH1060> of my sons <WH1121> I redeem <WH6299>.

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> upon thy hand <WH3027>, and for frontlets <WH2903> between thine eyes <WH5869>: for by strength <WH2392> of hand <WH3027> Jehovah <WH3068> brought us forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it came to pass <WH6547>, when Pharaoh had let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971>, that God <WH430> led <WH5148> them not by the way <WH1870> of the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>, although <WH3588> that was near <WH7138>; for God <WH430> said <WH559>, Lest peradventure the people <WH5971> repent <WH5162> when they see <WH7200> war <WH4421>, and they return <WH7725> to Egypt <WH4714>:

but God <WH430> led <WH5437> the people <WH5971> about <WH5437>, by the way <WH1870> of the wilderness <WH4057> by the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went up <WH5927> armed <WH2571> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the bones <WH6106> of Joseph <WH3130> with him <WH7650>: for he had straitly sworn <WH7650> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, God <WH430> will surely <WH6485> visit <WH6485> you <WH5927>; and ye shall carry up my bones <WH6106> away hence with you <WH5927>.
And they took their journey <WH5265> from Succoth <WH5523>, and encamped <WH2583> in Etham <WH864>, in the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness <WH4057>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> went <WH1980> before <WH6440> them by day <WH3119> in a pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051>, to lead <WH5148> them the way <WH1870>, and by night <WH3915> in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784>, to give them light <WH215>; that they might go <WH3212> by day <WH3119> and by night <WH3915>:
the pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> by day <WH3119>, and the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>, departed <WH4185> not from before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>.
